LanguageData.COAA_CookInsectMealSimple.label: cook simple insect meal
LanguageData.COAA_CookInsectMealSimple.description: Cook a straightforward meal from insect meat.
LanguageData.COAA_CookInsectMealFine.label: cook fine insect meal
LanguageData.COAA_CookInsectMealFine.description: Cook a somewhat complex meal from a combination of insect meat and plant ingredients.
LanguageData.COAA_CookInsectMealLavish.label: cook lavish insect meal
LanguageData.COAA_CookInsectMealLavish.description: Cook a very complex meal from a combination of insect meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
LanguageData.COAA_CookInsectMealSurvival.label: cook packaged survival insect meal
LanguageData.COAA_CookInsectMealSurvival.description: Prepare a packaged survival meal from a combination of insect meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in the preservation process.
LanguageData.COAA_MakeInsectPemmican.label: make insect pemmican
LanguageData.COAA_MakeInsectPemmican.description: Make insect pemmican, a preserved combination of insect meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a long time without refrigeration.
